parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO findings (finding_id, repo_name, severity, title, description, fix_suggestion, affected_file, line_number, cwe_id, pci_requirement, risk_score, status, created_at) 
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.finding_id }}', 
  '{{ $json.evidence.repo }}', 
  '{{ $json.severity }}', 
  '{{ $json.title.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
  '{{ $json.description.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
  '{{ $json.fix_suggestion.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 
  '{{ $json.evidence.file }}', 
  {{ $json.evidence.line }}, 
  '{{ $json.cwe_id }}', 
  '{{ $json.pci_requirement }}', 
  {{ $json.risk_score }}, 
  'open', 
  NOW()
)

RETURNING *

=INSERT INTO knowledge_simple (title, content, doc_type, keywords, source_type, created_at) VALUES ('{{ $json.title }}', '{{ $json.content }}', '{{ $json.doc_type }}', {{ $json.keywords_array }}, '{{ $json.source_type }}', NOW())

RETURNING *
=INSERT INTO evidence_packages (finding_id, evidence_document, created_at) VALUES ('{{ $('Store Finding to Database').item.json.finding_id }}', '{{ $json.body }}', NOW())
=INSERT INTO workflow_logs (workflow_name, execution_id, status, findings_processed, created_at) VALUES ('PCI Requirement 6 Automation', '{{ $execution.id }}', 'success', 1, NOW())

values.content:
You are a PCI DSS security expert specializing in Requirement 6 (Secure Development). Analyze the security finding and provide comprehensive remediation guidance.

For each finding, output EXACTLY this JSON structure (no markdown, no extra text):
{
  "finding_id": "unique_id_based_on_input",
  "severity": "critical|high|medium|low",
  "pci_requirement": "6.x.x format",
  "cwe_id": "from input",
  "title": "clear title",
  "description": "detailed vulnerability explanation",
  "fix_suggestion": "specific code fix with examples",
  "risk_score": "number 1-10",
  "evidence": {
    "scan_tool": "Snyk SAST",
    "scan_date": "current_timestamp",
    "repo": "repository_name",
    "file": "affected_file_path",
    "line": "line_number"
  }
}
